#pragma config(Sensor, S3,     reflectedValue, sensorEV3_Color)
//*!!Code automatically generated by 'ROBOTC' configuration wizard               !!*//


task main()
{
motor[motorB] = +10;
motor[motorC] = +10;

while(SensorValue(reflectedValue) > 50){}
playSound(soundBeepBeep);
wait1Msec(1000);
motor[motorB] = +10;
motor[motorC] = +10;

while(SensorValue(reflectedValue) > 50){}
playSound(soundBeepBeep);
playSound(soundBeepBeep);
wait1Msec(1000);
motor[motorB] = +10;
motor[motorC] = +10;

while(SensorValue(reflectedValue) > 50){}
playSound(soundBeepBeep);
playSound(soundBeepBeep);
playSound(soundBeepBeep);
wait1Msec(1000);

motor[motorB] = +10;
motor[motorC] = +10;

while(SensorValue(reflectedValue) > 50){}
playSound(soundBeepBeep);
playSound(soundBeepBeep);
playSound(soundBeepBeep);
playSound(soundBeepBeep);
wait1Msec(2000);

motor[motorB] = +0;
motor[motorC] = +0;

}
